sentence.text: We detected 11 novel mutations in liGJA3/i, liGJA8/i, liCRYAA/i, liCRYBB2/i, liCRYGS/i, liCRYGA/i, liGCNT2/i, liCRYGA/i, and liMIP/i; and three previously reported cataract-causing mutations in liGJA8/i, liCRYAA/i, and liCRYBB2/i The most commonly mutated genes were those coding for negative regulation of cell-matrix adhesion junctions and crystallin proteins.
